content: भुजः [भुज्यतेऽनेन, भुज्-घञर्थे करणे क] {@--1@} The arm; ज्ञास्यसि कियद्भुजो मे रक्षति मौर्वीकिणांक इति <ls>Ś. 1. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 34</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 7</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 55.</ls> {@--2@} The hand. {@--3@} The trunk of an elephant. {@--4@} A bend, curve. {@--5@} The side of a mathematical figure; as in त्रिभुजः ‘a triangle.’ {@--6@} The base of a triangle. {@--7@} A branch (of a tree). {@--8@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) The base of a shadow.
